sentences.sContent: Coffee shops are ubiquitous these days.
sentences.sCn: 如今好像到处都是咖啡馆。

sentences.sContent: a French film, starring the ubiquitous Gérard Depardieu
sentences.sCn: 一部法国电影，由家喻户晓的热拉尔·德帕迪约主演

synos.tran: 普遍存在的；无所不在的

remMethod.val: ubi(=where) + qu(=any) + itous → anywhere → 无处不在的

trans.tranOther: seeming to be everywhere – sometimes used humorously
